betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Soul Machine Chassis§r is used as a crafting ingredient for the §esoul-related machines§r throughout the §5EnderIO§r mod. 

To craft one, you'll need to mix a §6Simple Machine Chassis§r and a §6Soul Attuned Dye Blend§r into the §6Induction Smelter§r.

(§7PS: §9NeoTechnologies§7 says that if your machine begins making screaming sounds, please call Ghastbusters on 1800 GHASTS. I have no clue what §7NT§7 means so just take it with a grain of infinity.§r)
